title: Keheliya’s unpaid electricity bill over Rs. 12 mn
content: Health Minister Keheliya Rambukwella has long-overdue electricity bill arrears for a Colombo 7 residence of his amounting to over Rs. 12 million (Rs. 12,056,803.38), and the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) has sent a letter to him in January requesting him to settle the outstanding amount.CEB officials had made a field visit to Rambukwella’s house on 22 December 2021, and had held discussions with his wife.The CEB requested Rambukwella to settle the due payment as soon as possible and for him to transfer the CEB consumer account under his name.
